snippet.title: "Felix the Cat Cartoon Toolbox" gambits
snippet.description:
Here’s a rather obscure CD-ROM game from 1995 I haven’t shared here yet: “Felix the Cat’s Cartoon Toolbox,” from Big Top. Make goofy little animated shorts with the cast of the 1958-1961 “Felix the Cat” animated series. The voices are actual dialogue clips from the show (by Jack Mercer), and for some reason the game’s sound library uses a ton of familiar Hanna-Barbera sound effects (which the show didn’t use.) The first batch of cartoons are samples included with the program, and then I show a couple I whipped up.

If anything about this game seems familiar, it’s because its’ engine was reused a year later for the more well-known “The Simpsons Cartoon Studio.”
